original_data.title: Knocking Sound Effects With Emotional Intentions
original_data.description: The dataset was recorded by the professional foley artist Ulf Olausson at the FoleyWorks (http://foleyworks.se/) studios in Stockholm on the 15th October, 2019. Inspired by previous work on knocking sounds [1]. we chose five type of emotions to be portrayed in the dataset: anger, fear, happiness, neutral and sadness.
